name: The ICAPMOT 2024 - Canada International Conference on Business, Entrepreneurship, and Technology
content: Join us for the eagerly awaited ICAPMOT 2024 Conference, a groundbreaking two-day event that converges the realms of business, technology, and entrepreneurship. Set to take place on 18th and 19th May 2024, at the prestigious Courtyard by Marriott Hotel in Brampton, ON, Canada, this conference promises to be an enriching experience for professionals, researchers, and enthusiasts alike. Register at https://icapmot.ca/ or email us on conference@seed-nanotech.com to embark on a journey of knowledge, inspiration, and growth. We look forward to welcoming you to Brampton in May 2024!
organizers: Seed NanoTech International Incorporated conference series
